p: Representative concentration pathway 6.0 assumes that the global warming will rise from 0.8 to 1.8 and 1.4 to 3.1 °C between the years 2046 and 2064 and 2081–2100, respectively. Mean global sea level will increase from 0.18 to 0.32 and 0.33 to 0.63 m over the same periods ( Stocker et al., 2013).
